comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/73868
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=25a7899a3e24a336579210a68abe4ddd136803f2
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 25a7899a3e24a336579210a68abe4ddd136803f2
Author: Gary Kotton <email address hidden>
Date:   Sun Feb 16 03:25:48 2014 -0800

    VMware: improve unit test time
    
    A number of tests would invoke code that would sleep. This
    patch adds a mocked function for the sleep.
    
    Change-Id: I2d36bd456a11fcb7145baa5eb4c6875b9ec765d3
    Closes-bug: #1280758
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
